tap.data

Class VOTableIterator.StreamVOTableSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • tap.data.VOTableIterator.StreamVOTableSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    uk.ac.starlink.table.TableSink
    Enclosing class:
    VOTableIterator

    protected static class VOTableIterator.StreamVOTableSink
extends java.lang.Object
implements uk.ac.starlink.table.TableSink

    This class lets consume the metadata and rows of a VOTable document.

    On the contrary to a usual TableSink, this one will stop after each row until this row has been fetched by VOTableIterator.

    Besides, the metadata returned by StarTable are immediately converted into TAP metadata. If this conversion fails, the error is kept in metaError, so that the VOTable reading can continue if the fact that metadata are missing is not a problem for the class using the VOTableIterator.

    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0 (04/2015)
    Author:
    Grégory Mantelet (ARI)

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public void stop()

        Stop nicely reading the VOTable.

        An exception will be thrown to the STILTS class using this TableSink, but no exception should be thrown to VOTableIterator.

      • getMeta

        public TAPColumn[] getMeta()
                    throws DataReadException

        Get the metadata found in the VOTable.

        Note: This method is blocking until metadata are fully available by this TableSink or if an error occurred while converting them in TAP metadata. A Thread interruption will also make this function returning.

        Returns:
        The metadata found in the VOTable header.
        Throws:
        DataReadException - If the metadata can not be interpreted correctly.

      • getRow

        public java.lang.Object[] getRow()

        Get the last accepted row.

        Note: This function is blocking until a row has been accepted or the end of the stream has been reached. A Thread interruption will also make this function returning.

        Returns:
        The last accepted row, or NULL if no more rows are available or if the iteration has been interrupted/canceled.

      • extractColMeta

        protected TAPColumn[] extractColMeta(uk.ac.starlink.table.StarTable table)
                              throws DataReadException
        Extract an array of TAPColumn objects. Each corresponds to one of the columns listed in the given table, and so corresponds to the metadata of a column.
        Parameters:
        table - StarTable which contains only the columns' information.
        Returns:
        The corresponding list of TAPColumn objects.
        Throws:
        DataReadException - If there is a problem while resolving the field datatype (for instance: unknown datatype, a multi-dimensional array is provided, a bad number format for the arraysize).

      • getAuxDatumValue

        protected java.lang.String getAuxDatumValue(uk.ac.starlink.table.ColumnInfo colInfo,
                                java.lang.String auxDatumName)
        Extract the specified auxiliary datum value from the given ColumnInfo.
        Parameters:
        colInfo - ColumnInfo from which the auxiliary datum must be extracted.
        auxDatumName - The name of the datum to extract.
        Returns:
        The extracted value as String.
